text: Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa Hajaru Wa Jahadu Bi'amwalihim Wa 'Anfusihim Fi Sabili Allahi Wa Al-Ladhina 'Awaw Wa Nasaru 'Ula'ika Ba`đuhum 'Awliya'u Ba`đin Wa Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa Lam Yuhajaru Ma Lakum Min Walayatihim Min Shay'in Hatta Yuhajiru Wa 'Ini Astansarukum Fi Ad-Dini Fa`alaykumu An-Nasru 'Illa `Ala Qawmin Baynakum Wa Baynahum Mithaqun Wa Allahu Bima Ta`maluna Basirun
